title: lol mmo
body: immagine a leauge of legends mmo picture exploring runeterra choosing what race yordle,human ect and doing quests going to the sumoners rift and play a normal match of lol that affects your mmo side of ur account it would be so cool meetig champs like garen or darius and then you get to help a side in the war like noxus or demacia my spelling is shit because i had this idea at 4.30 in the morning.

replies.body: I think it would be pretty fun :)
